briefdescription.para: Allocates a linked list node.

detaileddescription.para: Useful for preallocating nodes and using _dbus_list_append_link() to avoid allocations.

parameterdescription.para: the value to store in the link.

briefdescription.para: Frees a linked list node allocated with _dbus_list_alloc_link.

detaileddescription.para: Does not free the data in the node.

briefdescription.para: Appends a value to the list.

detaileddescription.para: May return FALSE if insufficient memory exists to add a list link. This is a constant-time operation.

briefdescription.para: Prepends a value to the list.

detaileddescription.para: May return FALSE if insufficient memory exists to add a list link. This is a constant-time operation.

briefdescription.para: Appends a link to the list.

detaileddescription.para: Cannot fail due to out of memory. This is a constant-time operation.

briefdescription.para: Prepends a link to the list.

detaileddescription.para: Cannot fail due to out of memory. This is a constant-time operation.

briefdescription.para: Inserts data into the list after the given existing link.

parameterdescription.para: existing link to insert after, or NULL to prepend

simplesect.para: TRUE on success, FALSE if memory allocation fails

briefdescription.para: Inserts a link into the list before the given existing link.

parameterdescription.para: existing link to insert before, or NULL to append

briefdescription.para: Inserts a link into the list after the given existing link.

parameterdescription.para: existing link to insert after, or NULL to prepend

briefdescription.para: Removes a value from the list.

detaileddescription.para: Only removes the first value equal to the given data pointer, even if multiple values exist which match. This is a linear-time operation.

simplesect.para: TRUE if a value was found to remove.

briefdescription.para: Removes a value from the list.

detaileddescription.para: Only removes the last value equal to the given data pointer, even if multiple values exist which match. This is a linear-time operation.

simplesect.para: TRUE if a value was found to remove.

briefdescription.para: Finds a value in the list.

detaileddescription.para: Returns the last link with value equal to the given data pointer. This is a linear-time operation. Returns NULL if no value found that matches.

briefdescription.para: Removes the given link from the list, but doesn't free it.

detaileddescription.para: _dbus_list_remove_link() both removes the link and also frees it.

briefdescription.para: Removes a link from the list.

detaileddescription.para: This is a constant-time operation.

briefdescription.para: Frees all links in the list and sets the list head to NULL.

detaileddescription.para: Does not free the data in each link, for obvious reasons. This is a linear-time operation.

briefdescription.para: Gets the first link in the list.

detaileddescription.para: This is a constant-time operation.

simplesect.para: the first link, or NULL for an empty list.

briefdescription.para: Gets the last link in the list.

detaileddescription.para: This is a constant-time operation.

simplesect.para: the last link, or NULL for an empty list.

briefdescription.para: Gets the last data in the list.

detaileddescription.para: This is a constant-time operation.

simplesect.para: the last data in the list, or NULL for an empty list.

briefdescription.para: Gets the first data in the list.

detaileddescription.para: This is a constant-time operation.

simplesect.para: the first data in the list, or NULL for an empty list.

briefdescription.para: Removes the first link in the list and returns it.

detaileddescription.para: This is a constant-time operation.

simplesect.para: the first link in the list, or NULL for an empty list.

briefdescription.para: Removes the first value in the list and returns it.

detaileddescription.para: This is a constant-time operation.

simplesect.para: the first data in the list, or NULL for an empty list.

briefdescription.para: Removes the last value in the list and returns it.

detaileddescription.para: This is a constant-time operation.

simplesect.para: the last data in the list, or NULL for an empty list.

briefdescription.para: Copies a list.

detaileddescription.para: This is a linear-time operation. If there isn't enough memory to copy the entire list, the destination list will be set to NULL.

parameterdescription.para: address of the head of the list to copy.
address where the copied list should be placed.

simplesect.para: TRUE on success, FALSE if not enough memory.

briefdescription.para: Gets the length of a list.

detaileddescription.para: This is a linear-time operation.

parameterdescription.para: address of the head of the list

simplesect.para: number of elements in the list.

briefdescription.para: Calls the given function for each element in the list.

detaileddescription.para: The function is passed the list element as its first argument, and the given data as its second argument.

parameterdescription.para: address of the head of the list.
function to call for each element.

briefdescription.para: Check whether length is exactly one.

simplesect.para: TRUE if length is exactly one

briefdescription.para: Gets the next link in the list, or NULL if there are no more links.

detaileddescription.para: Used for iteration.

simplesect.para: the next link, or NULL if none.

briefdescription.para: Gets the previous link in the list, or NULL if there are no more links.

detaileddescription.para: Used for iteration.

simplesect.para: the previous link, or NULL if none.

briefdescription.para: DBusList data structure.

detaileddescription.para: Types and functions related to DBusList.
